meanings.definition: A large motor vehicle designed to carry passengers by road.
meanings.sent1: The motorbus arrived at the bus stop right on time.
meanings.sent2: I take the motorbus to work every morning.
meanings.sent3: The motorbus driver told a joke to the passengers, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the motorbus like music.
meanings.sent5: The bright red motorbus stood out among the other vehicles on the road.

meanings.sent1: We decided to motorbus to the city instead of driving.
meanings.sent2: They motorbus to different towns for their business meetings.
meanings.sent3: He likes to motorbus around town to explore new places.
meanings.sent4: Her mind would motorbus through memories of past journeys.
meanings.sent5: The group planned to motorbus across the country for their vacation.
